data.name: Puzzle
data.description:
Embark on a puzzle-filled journey featuring 50+ levels of escalating challenges. 

Begin with easy levels to grasp game mechanics, perfect for solo play or family fun. 
Your mission: guide the clever fox through the map to collect all the coins using available blocks and tablet space.

Listen keenly to the hero's guidance for valuable hints. 
Unlock additional small games for a relaxing interlude between challenging levels. 
Delve deeper into the adventure by exploring hidden options—can you make Foxy happy? 
Discover a variety of blocks at your disposal, each with a unique function: Move, Turn left, Turn right, Grab, Procedure, and Loop. 
Strategize and use these blocks wisely to navigate through intricate levels.

Immerse yourself further with hero voice support, complemented by optional subtitles. 
Choose your preferred playing style with support for sitting, standing, or room-scale gameplay. 
Customization is at your fingertips—adjust the chair height seamlessly in the settings menu to optimize your gaming experience.

It's an interactive experience that challenges your mind, encourages creativity, and offers a delightful escape for players of all ages. 
Download now and join Foxy on a captivating adventure filled with surprises, challenges, and the pursuit of happiness!
